items: Is the UI responsive and accessible (WCAG 2.1 AA compliant)?
Are assets (images, scripts, styles) optimized and compressed?
Is state management handled predictably (e.g., Redux, Context, Vuex)?
Are component render cycles optimized to prevent performance bottlenecks?
Is input sanitization performed to prevent XSS attacks?
Are modern browser features used with appropriate polyfills for legacy support?
